embeds.title: üöß   Current Progress
embeds.description:
We're looking for active and involved members to join our roster.
Check the post below to see what classes/specs we're in particular need of.
Don't play any of those specs? Hit us up and we'll see if we can resolve it.
__Socials are welcome no matter what!__

embeds.title: ‚åö   Raid Times
embeds.description:
Our times for raiding may vary with content progression. 
Raid times are expected to be lowered once raids are on farm.
The days and times below are representative for current content raids. 
Older raids will be ran seperatly.
